statements: DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND transaction_date = '2022-05-15';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND description LIKE '%refund%';
DELETE FROM categories WHERE category_id = 2 AND type = 'expense';

DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND date < '2021-01-01';
